name: Liquid Havoc
description:
Craft custom liquids with mind-bending properties and create scenes using the Scene Editor! Enjoy 60+ simulations that bring realism to destruction with shatter physics, soft body dynamics, real-time fluid simulation, structural integrity, and countless exciting features!

Unleash the raw power of fluid dynamics in over 60 simulations. Shatter objects, crumple metal using soft body physics, or obliterate structures leveraging real-time structural integrity mechanics.

Note: "Liquid Havoc" is not a game and there is no concept of winning or losing. It is a sandbox of many possibilities, where your imagination is the only limit.

New objects and improvements to the editor may be added in the future with support, feedback and the success of the simulation.
Make sure to try all the simulations. Don't prefer a simulation? Simply skip it and move onto the next by pressing F2.

Press Tab while playing to view the controls and tutorial:

Let me know your thoughts in the discussions, I will use the funds generated from this game to help fund this game or my other projects. I appreciate all of the support!

Modify Liquid Properties
.

Destroy Structures and Play with AI
.

Trailer music: Press Fuse by French Fuse
